alert.note: Alert for Rawlins; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued December 02 at 1:51PM CST until December 02 at 3:15PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Rawlins County in northwestern Kansas... Hitchcock County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 315 PM CST. * At 150 PM CST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Culbertson to 10 miles north of McDonald to 12 miles south of St. Francis, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar, public reports and satellite imagery. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 36 and 74. Locations impacted include... Colby, Oakley, Atwood, Trenton, Brewster, Levant and Culbertson. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... There is no safe place on a highway when a dust storm hits. Visibility can be lost immediately, making it difficult or impossible to slow down and avoid stopped vehicles. Delay travel, or safely exit the highway before the dust storm arrives.
